content.section: Flank Guard is a tier 2 tank that can be selected upon reaching level 15, and at tier 3, can be upgraded into "Tri-Angle", "Quad Tank", "Twin Flank" and "Auto 3". It features 2 barrels at the opposite ends of the tank body; the back barrel being shorter than the front.
- Flank Guard has no recoil, making it less reliant on positioning skills and aim - having a much easier time building up a bullet wall and bomb rushing tanks.

- The Flank Guard has the 2nd smallest tier 2 branch out of the 4, with 8 possible level 45 upgrades. - The achievement for upgrading to Flank Guard is "Ain't no one sneaking up on ME". - Flank Guard was the ninth tank to be added to the game, after Machine Gun; with its ID being '8'. - In one of the oldest versions, the barrels of the Flank Guard would fire at alternating times. People created spin bots to abuse this mechanic, which started the first ever form of flip fire.
